title: Man, Change, the natural world and gender
main_text:
Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.‚Äù Lao Tzu

Kew Gardens by Katherine Mansfield

The Secret Adversary by Agatha Christie

Rocking Horse Winner by D.H. Lawrence
